media.headline: Mazara's two-run home run
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Mazara crushes a two-run homer to right
media.bigblurb: Nomar Mazara belts a two-run home run to right field, his first of the season, to open the scoring in the bottom of the 1st inning

media.headline: Ramirez's two-run single
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Ramirez plates two with single to right
media.bigblurb: Jose Ramirez lines a single to right field that drives in two runs, before being tagged out at second base to end the top of the 4th inning

media.headline: Perez cuts down Odor
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Perez nabs Odor trying to steal second base
media.bigblurb: Roberto Perez springs up from behind the plate and fires down to second, catching Rougned Odor attempting to steal in the bottom of the 4th

media.headline: Perez's sacrifice fly
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Perez drives in Diaz with sac fly to left
media.bigblurb: Roberto Perez plates Yandy Diaz with a sacrifice fly to left field to give the Indians a 3-2 lead in the top of the 5th inning

media.headline: Rangers plate two after error
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Lucroy, Gallo score on Lindor's error
media.bigblurb: Shin-Soo Choo hits a grounder to Francisco Lindor who makes a throwing error to first, allowing Jonathan Lucroy and Joey Gallo to score

media.headline: Mazara's RBI single
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Mazara knocks in Choo with single to center
media.bigblurb: Nomar Mazara lines a single to center field, scoring Shin-Soo Choo to extend the Rangers' lead to 5-3 in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Lindor's solo home run
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Lindor crushes a solo homer to left field
media.bigblurb: Francisco Lindor belts a solo home run to left field, cutting the Indians' deficit to one run in the top of the 6th inning

media.headline: Andrus' solo homer
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Andrus lifts a solo home run to left
media.bigblurb: Elvis Andrus slugs a solo home run to left field, extending the Rangers' lead to 6-4 in the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Santana's RBI walk in 9th
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Santana plates a run on an RBI walk
media.bigblurb: Carlos Santana works a four-pitch walk to drive in a run and bring the Indians within a run in the top of the 9th inning

media.headline: Salazar strikes out nine
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Salazar fans nine over 5 2/3 innings
media.bigblurb: Danny Salazar racks up nine strikeouts over 5 2/3 innings while giving up four earned runs in his 2017 debut vs. the Rangers

media.headline: Lindor's go-ahead grand slam
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Lindor crushes a grand slam to take the lead
media.bigblurb: Francisco Lindor launches a grand slam to right field, his second homer of the game, to give the Indians a 9-6 lead in the 9th #PapaSlam

media.headline: Bush fans Ramirez
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Bush whiffs Ramirez in the top of the 8th
media.bigblurb: Matt Bush strikes out Jose Ramirez swinging to end the top of the 8th inning

media.headline: Shaw notches the save
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Shaw retires Robinson to earn the save
media.bigblurb: Bryan Shaw gets Drew Robinson to ground out to Francisco Lindor to earn the save in the Indians' 9-6 win over the Rangers

media.headline: Indians turn two in 2nd
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Lindor, Ramirez combine for double play
media.bigblurb: Francisco Lindor fields a grounder off the bat of Jonathan Lucroy and flips to Jose Ramirez, who fires to first to complete the double paly

media.headline: Hamels' first K of the season
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Hamels records his first strikeout of 2017
media.bigblurb: Cole Hamels records his first strikeout of the season after catching Francisco Lindor looking in the top of the 1st inning

media.headline: Must C: Lindor lifts Tribe
media.blurb: Must C Clutch: Lindor's two homers help Tribe sweep
media.bigblurb: Francisco Lindor smashed two homers, including a go-ahead 9th-inning grand slam to propel the Indians to a three-game sweep over the Rangers

media.headline: Banister on loss to Indians
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Banister discusses tough late inning lose
media.bigblurb: Rangers manager Jeff Banister talks about the team's loss to the Indians after blowing a 6-4 lead in the 9th inning

media.headline: Lindor on go-ahead grand slam
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Lindor discusses his 9th inning grand slam
media.bigblurb: Francisco Lindor talks about his approach at the plate in the 9th inning which resulted in a go-ahead grand slam in the team's 9-6 win

media.headline: Francona talks Indians' comeback
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Francona on late grand slam, hot start
media.bigblurb: Cleveland manager Terry Francona talks about Francisco Lindor's 9th inning, go-ahead grand slam in the team's 9-6 win over the Rangers

media.headline: Fan has fun behind home plate
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Fan dances, does pushups behind home plate
media.bigblurb: A Rangers fan behind home plate has some fun in the 9th inning, showing off various dance moves and doing some pushups on the seats

media.headline: 4/5/17 CG: CLE@TEX
media.blurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: CLE@TEX
media.bigblurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: CLE@TEX

media.headline: Recap: CLE 9, TEX 6
media.blurb: 4/5/17: Lindor powers the Tribe past the Rangers
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Francisco Lindor launched two home runs, including a go-ahead grand slam in the top of the 9th to lead the Indians
